data.message: Fix disconnected nodes bug in InterSphere knowledge graph: Fixed by normalizing all links to string IDs when updating graph data. Force-graph was mutating link objects (replacing strings with node references), causing stale references when nodes were expanded.
data.task: Fix disconnected nodes bug in InterSphere knowledge graph
data.outcome: Fixed by normalizing all links to string IDs when updating graph data. Force-graph was mutating link objects (replacing strings with node references), causing stale references when nodes were expanded.
